head.citation-title: Dual-tree quaternion wavelets for face recognition
head.abstracts: In this paper, we introduce a new face recognition approach for image feature extraction named dual-tree quaternion wavelets (QWT). QWT is the basis of the 2-D HT, 2-D analytic signal and uses the quaternion algebra. QWT has three phase angles. Two phases can encode local image shifts and the other encodes textural information. Extensive experiments are performed on FERET face database and AR face database. The QWT method achieves better face recognition performance than PCA, 2DPCA, LPP and 2DLPP. Copyright Â© 2010 Binary Information Press.
